You mean yi?
Pretty sure he deals magic/true damage too by building ad

Actually, AD champs are. Jaugernauts Tanks that arent real Fighters, and ADCs.

AP do it cause several are useless w/o going Tank. Not many, but you clearly see the issue. Akali for example, but not Lux.

Exception, Ekko, base values freaking high.

AD does it cause items are cheap, give AD, HP, and great passives. Pretty much all ADCs save Blue Ez. Assassins. (that Maw and Sterak's).
Jaugernauts cause the items were meant for em XD.

Is it bad, not necessarily. But it has become an issue in that some are clearly so broken on it.
Pretty sure Riot is well aware of the problem, and they're going to solve it soon(TM)
Considering how the new masteries are the biggest problem (and have been since preseason)  and how aggressively they've defended them, I highly doubt it.
